title: Team Iron Looking for Mid/Top Plat 3 +

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Team Iron (@TeamIronEsports). No Doubt! No Fear! Australian Esports organisation. Follow for the latest updates on the team!. Australia

body:
Team Iron is looking for Dedicated, team oriented Mid and Top laner looking to go into the Open Ladder in 2017 to break into challenger series.

Requirements: 

* Platinum 3 and above
* Working Mic
* Stable reliable internet
* Fluent in English
* Discord
* Dedicated (were in for the long haul)
* 18 years +

 Send us a DM on our Twitter or leave a comment on this thread!

 Good luck to all applicants.

replies.body: Hey there! Plat 3 and climbing, mid laner who is interested in trying out. IGN: DaBuLaCeR

g4 top laner 
wanting to learn more with higher elo players
was with a team for 6 months but they were silvers and i was highest ranked so i was shott caller
would like to expand and play in the upcoming tournaments with people that have more experience
I'd love to join, plat 3 mid laner. IGN Celestite
Hit me up d5 atm. Play top lane. Ign wompy.
